titleStmt.title: The Christian hearer's first lesson a sermon preached at St. Mary's Church in Nottingham on Thursday, Octob. the 4th, 1694 : the first day of a lecture preached there weekly by the ministers of that town and country : publish'd to satisfie the desire of some of the auditors / by Clem Elis ...
titleStmt.author: Ellis, Clement, 1630-1700.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
